I just discovered these new Triscuit are baked with brown rice and sweet potato.
And the worst part is they're delicious.
Maybe we should give other new things a chance.
We've taken 100% whole-grain brown rice and wheat,...
...delicious sweet potato and savory red bean, and woven them into something unexpected.
The new Brown Rice Triscuit line with sweet potato and red bean varieties.
A new take on an old favorite.
